data.message: What's your maximum event store size for a single tenant? We're looking at processing around 500k events per day and want to understand storage implications and performance characteristics at scale.

data.message: Love the performance so far. We've processed over 2M events in the first week without any hiccups. The Rust backend really shines - our p99 latency is consistently under 50ms even during peak loads. Great work on the event sourcing implementation.

data.message: We're considering migrating from a traditional CRUD system to event sourcing. Could you explain your approach to maintaining consistency between different views and how you handle race conditions? Also interested in your strategy for rebuilding projections without downtime.

data.message: Real estate team here. We need advanced document management and e-signature capabilities. Mobile access is crucial as our agents are always on the go. Would love to see how your system handles property listings and client matching. Calendar integration is also important.

data.message: Looking at the technical architecture - can you explain how you're using tokio for async operations, particularly around database interactions? What led you to choose Rust over Go or Node for this, and how has it impacted system reliability?

data.message: Are there plans for AI/ML features in the roadmap?

data.message: How do you handle schema migrations when the event structure needs to change? Particularly interested in backward compatibility and your versioning strategy for long-lived events.

data.message: Performance numbers for concurrent users?

data.message: Could you deep dive into your CQRS implementation? Specifically interested in how you handle eventual consistency in the UI, your approach to read models, and how you optimize for different query patterns.

data.message: We're processing sensitive healthcare data - can you detail your encryption approach both at rest and in transit? Also interested in your audit logging capabilities and compliance certifications.

data.message: Can we see the email marketing integration?

data.message: We're seeing massive latency spikes during peak hours (>2s response times). System was fine last week. Running latest version, no recent changes on our end. Need assistance identifying the bottleneck. Attached metrics and logs.
